title: Chaos Avatar - El Poder de la Palabra - Alternative Metal
description:
Greetings,  this  is my first torrent. Its an aleternative Metal from Venezuela called Chaos Avatar. Go to www.chaosavatar.com  and hear the songs streaming and then download the torrent if you  like how it goes.

______________________________________________________

Chaos Avatar is a musical project born in Caracas, Venezuela, 1997, who presents a new way to conceive the fusion between styles like Rock, Metal, Industrial and Symphonic, with its very own identity. The Religious - bizarre - reflexive concept of their songs and art suggests deep and intense atmospheres.

Chaos Avatar has always been characterized by its versatility and variety of fusion styles in their musical pieces and by the philosophical character of its proposal, far from being music to dance, have fun or forget, it is a journey to the forgotten corners and interrogants of our existence and the everyday inertia.

EL PODER DE LA PALABRA 2008
Format: mp3 / 128kbps
